channel.title: Project Tobex - Free Web Clients for everyone! [RELEASED]
channel.description:
Finally finished this :D :eek: : (just a few example webclients i was testing out and playing around with settings, credits if i used your server ;) ) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/27y0b29.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/6302/viewallservers.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/3774/create.png[/img]
[center][u][b]Project Tobex - Your Very Own Web Client![/b][/u][/center] Who can use this? Anyone Skill needed? Nothing, everything is done via the online control panel Cost: Free, $5 to upgrade to premium server.
Aims: -To give your players somewhere to play your server quickly -To give server owners options they would normally have in a downloadable client
How about this v. Silabsoft client?
Reasons not to use silabsoft:
If your going to give reason give valid ones with proof.
Project Tobex:
-Customize your webclient from an online control panel - no compiling or waiting! Change background image, server ip, server name (shows up in client too), server port, prayer or pk headicons, high or low detail, loading bar colour, border, text etc... -The only difference between normal and premium is one advert on your client page :) -Donating servers table on main page, in order of amount donated :D -Highest donating server will get the play button on main page - meaning anyone who clicks it, goes to the highest donating server's webclient page. -Only one advert, and you can choose above or below your client, and premium servers can remove these. -Will add a 'remember me' function -Refreshable (Reloadable) in browser -Cache Downloads Quickly, and inside the client, no more JFrame for it ;) -New style npcs (moss giant, hill giant, lesser demon etc) -377 cache, meaning pest control and obelisks works -508 gameframe, slightly modified to look more attractive -Server owners have complete control over client, they can make it connect to only their server, and can make it connect to only their port, from the browser window -Over 400 new + custom items -No need for any java knowledge - anyone can make their own professional looking webclient that only connects to their ip, directly from a website. -No bugs with mapback -Magic tab works perfectly -Redstones are correct -Will make full use of arguments for customization. -NO popups! -Server name can be changed without compiling client! -IP and Port can be changed without compiling client! -Dragon claws added -Cache takes < 2 minutes to download, and downloads inside loading bar, with percentage. -Client loads up right after cache is finished downloading -Hunter Style Login Box added, [B]may make transparent[/B]? (suggest) -No client side lagg -Client loads up faster -Added vengeance gfx
Picture 1: (JFrame, sprites and new items) [IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/5990/client2.png[/img] Picture 2: (Web client fully working and RS like Navbar) [IMG]http://img60.imageshack.us/img60/627/webclient2.png[/img] Picture 3: New Auto Cache Dling and ip & port using PHP $_get :) [IMG]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/3079/client3.png[/img]
Please suggest your ideas, no release date yet, sorry, but i want to finish this asap. Also, im looking for good hosting / domain, so tell me any good sites.
There won't be too many adverts on the page, and the link would be something like: [url=http://www.tobex.com/play.php?your_server_name_here]http://www.tobex.com/play.php?your_server_name_here[/url] (This is not advertising, as the link clearly doesn't lead anywhere) You would give that to your players, and wallah they can play. Url will work with .tk domains and ShortURL etc. Client page is discreet, looks exactly like a 508+ page (with navbar and buttons) Premium servers can customize their navbar.
Current applet code: (Fully working) [code] <applet name=client width=765 height=503 archive="loader.jar" code="client.class"> <PARAM name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx700m"> <PARAM name="server_name" value="ProonScape"> <PARAM name="detail" value="high"> <PARAM name="ip" value="127.0.0.1"> <PARAM name="port" value="5555"> <PARAM name="background_image" value="http://i31.tinypic.com/k17tpx.png"> <PARAM name="headicons" value="prayer"> </applet> [/code]
Q&a:
Q) Will this be open source? A) No, editing this type of project would be redundant, because it is built to be functional & customizable without compiling on a web site, and I want to make it a universal webclient, for everyone to use, so nobody can 'lose' their client files, I will make it satisfactory enough so you would rather use it than your client, it will be lagg free (as much as possible) and the cache will be tiny and download in under 2 minutes :D It will not have the words "Tobex" or any other credits going to me on your client page, I understand people like their clients to look professional.
Credits time: (these credits are not for the work Jagex did, obviously these are just credits for the people who modified it to make it what it is today...) [b]Fromdahood/Ryan - 70% - This guy taught me everything (he always helps me with my server / website) Ric914 - 25% - His amazing web client tutorial that can be used on almost any client if you've got a brain Tobias222 - 5% - Converting, moving stuff inside the cache, adding tonnes of models, all the website work (a lot), making webclient use parameters, making webclient reloadable, making play page like runescape, dedicating all my time to the project, converting deltascape client to webclient, making the clients load faster etc...[/b] [u][b]I NEED SUGGESTIONS, TUTORIALS, ITEMS AND ANYTHING ELSE YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE ON YOUR WEB CLIENT![/b][/u]
